name: Him, the Smile & Bloom
description: Refreshingly adult Otome, centered around a local flower shop, it is a mature exploration of relationships, and the highs and lows romance. With twelve endings to enjoy, it is sure to make both your heart melt and your pulse race.

name: Snooker Blitz
description:
Play snooker friends for free in Snooker Blitz. The only online snooker game you ever need.

The world is ready for a truly unique snooker game! Challenge your friends, enter snooker tournaments, and go head to head against other players in real-time. Shoot snooker with ultra-realistic physics, breath-taking graphics, and have more fun than you’ve ever had in real life!

name: The Great Fleece
description: Oliver and Darran are trying to raid the “Beatrice Auction House”. They need to sneak by some guards and avoid security cameras in order to get a key card to the vault. Can you help them out?

name: Night of the Dead Simulator
description:
Grab a weapon and follow us - doomsday is here, and time is running out!

The end of the human race is near. The zombie attack threatens our future, but there is hope. You, a soldier from the DELTA team, hold the cure in your hands. Will you be the one to save the world?

Use your weapons, search for and keep track of your ammo, and reach your objective several kilometers to the east. Hurry up and get a move on—time waits for no one.

Does anyone know how to dispatch a zombie? Face hordes of hundreds of zombies in an immersive bodycam experience.

Have some fun while you’re at it. Zombies are clumsy, and you're an expert in destruction, but don't forget that the end of the world is lurking around the corner. Make the most of what you’ve got around you!

name: Learn to Play Vol. 5: Break the Blocks

name: Supermarket Simulator Pro
description: Take charge of your very own supermarket in Supermarket Simulator Pro! Manage every aspect of your store from stocking shelves to handling customer checkout, ensuring a seamless shopping experience.

name: Truck Simulator Cargo Driver 2024: Euro
description: Explore a meticulously recreated Europe, delivering cargo across iconic landmarks and diverse landscapes. Master the challenges of the road, manage your virtual trucker's well-being, and customize your rig to become a legend of the European trucking scene!

name: Drift Master Simulator
description: Prepare to dominate the drift scene in Drift Master Simulator! Embark on your journey as a street drifter, where you'll begin by selecting your first car from iconic options in the USA, Japan, or Germany. With hard work, dedication, and skillful drifting, ascend through the ranks to claim your place as a top drifter. Feel the adrenaline as you master the art of controlled slides and perfect your technique on challenging tracks.

name: Street Survival: Homeless Simulator
description: Street Survival: Homeless Simulator plunges you into the unforgiving world of life on the streets. As a homeless individual, your daily struggle for survival is real and relentless. Set in a sprawling urban environment, the game challenges you to navigate the complexities of street life with limited resources and constant dangers.

name: Pixicharm: Dinoluship

name: Olympic 2024 Journey

name: Amer Fighting
description:
Get ready to rumble in Amer Fighting, the ultimate party fighting game where the fun never stops! Gather your friends and dive into an exciting family fight for up to 6 players as each battle is a chance to become a legend!
In Amer Fighting, everyone can fight, but only one can win!

name: Bus Driving Simulator: EVO
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Archives: Lead Angle
description:
"LEAD ANGLE" is a gun shooting game released by SEIBU KAIHATSU in 1988. You control the main character, GEORGE PHOENIX, and fight against gangsters.

Use pistols, grenades, machine guns, and shotguns to defeat the big boss "KING in the final stage.

name: World of Outlaws: Dirt Racing 24
description:
iRacing presents the Official Game of The World of Outlaws, featuring the World of Outlaws Sprint Car, Late Models and Super DIRTcar Big Block Modifieds, as well as 8 additional series including the all-new Micro Sprints, and many others.

World of Outlaws: Dirt Racing 24 features 49 tracks, including all your favorites like Eldora Speedway, Knoxville Raceway, and Volusia Speedway Park, with new additions like Kevin Harvick’s Kern Raceway, and Millbridge Speedway.

Become a LEGEND like Donny Schatz as you work your way through Career Mode in your quest to best his 10-time National Champion status. With so many combinations of cars, tracks, and experiences, your path to victory will be unique! And, don’t forget to check out the all new challenge mode where you can test your skills against Donny himself! Are you Outlaw Tough? It’s the Greatest Show on Dirt!

name: Pixicharm: Fit Frog's Feast
description: Help a lively frog collect tasty fruits while avoiding hazards. Use simple left and right controls to gather nutritious treats and enjoy a fun, stress-free experience with no lives to lose or defeats to worry about!

name: Game Empire Tycoon: Dealer Simulator
description: From small shop to big empire—can you level up?

name: Bus Simulator Driver 2024: City Zone
description: Step into the driver's seat of a variety of meticulously detailed buses and embark on a captivating journey through bustling city streets in "Bus Simulator Driver 2024 : City Zone" As a skilled bus operator, your mission is to faithfully follow designated routes, pick up passengers, and deliver them safely to their destinations. The city's intricate traffic patterns, unpredictable road conditions, and the needs of your passengers will put your driving prowess and multitasking abilities to the test.

name: Visa Control: USA Border Simulator
description: Will you uphold the law and make the right choices at the USA border?

name: Drag Racing Professionals: Dirt Mechanic Simulator
description: Immerse yourself in the world of adrenaline, speed, and drag racing mechanics on the quarter-mile with "Drag Racing Professionals: Dirt Mechanic Simulator." Become a master of drag racing, working in the atmosphere of gritty tracks and thrilling competitions.

name: ZombFarm
description: Engage in rewarding life sim elements and farming mini games while avoiding the undead that roam the nearby woods!

name: Odd Color Out
description: Sin descripción

name: P Fit
description:
P Fit is a puzzle game in which the player has to match the top and bottom pieces to move to the next level.

Both walls move slowly towards each other, if they touch you will have to start all over again. Your goal as a player is to last as long as possible.

name: Robbery Rush
description: Sin descripción

name: The Jumping Ice Cube
description: From the developers at The Jumping Food Games comes a refreshing new game of skill: "The Jumping Ice Cube". In this fast-paced endless game, you play as a nimble ice cube jumping through icy challenges that test your reactions and skill. How long can you hold out and chase your high score?

description: Embark on an unprecedented retail adventure with "Martian Supermarket Sim," where you spearhead the first supermarket venture on the dusty red plains of Mars, within the bustling colony of New Olympus. This is more than a business—it’s a cornerstone of a new civilization.

name: Chimp Test
description: Chimp Test is an innovative and engaging memory challenge game designed to push the boundaries of your cognitive abilities and thoroughly test your short-term memory skills. Inspired by the exceptional memory feats of chimpanzees, who have demonstrated remarkable ability in recalling complex sequences with astonishing speed and precision, Chimp Test offers a unique and interactive experience for players of all ages. Whether you are a casual gamer looking for an entertaining challenge or a dedicated enthusiast aiming to sharpen your mental acuity, this game provides a dynamic platform to enhance memory, concentration, and mental agility.

name: Color Recreator
description: Test your color recreating skills!

name: Crasho Cars
description: In Crasho Cars, race through the desert while evading obstacles and police cars that crash into each other. Collect money and power-ups to survive longer. The goal is simple: stay alive as long as you can in this high-speed, chaotic chase!

name: Leonor & Raúl: Christmas

name: Portal to the Cosmobeat
description: On his mission, to become the very best dancer ever, Gorb challenges incredible dance coaches all around the galaxy. Unfortunately, he is terrible. Can you dance him to the top?

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? 3rd Edition - Family Picture Edition
description: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? 3rd Edition - Family Picture Edition is a British DVD game released by Universal Pictures UK which is based on the British version of the game show Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?.

description: Wer wird millionär? is a German DVD game based on the TV show Wer wird millionär?, which is the German localization of Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?.

name: Soteria
description:
Made for the #GBJAM, Soteria is a Game Boy styled top down level-based shooter.

There are 15 levels filled with monsters and obstacles to overcome with the help of bullets and vombs.

name: The Witch, the Ghost and the Snake
description: Sin descripción

name: Brave New World 2
description:
BNW2 contains a total of 100 rooms across 26 exits, with 13 exits for Any% (no secrets/palaces). Most levels are 5-7 rooms in length.

Just like its predecessor, BNW2 is a showcase of glitches that exist within Super Mario World engine.
Some of these glitches (commonly found in "Kuso" hacks) can be extremely precise and require frame-perfect inputs.
My intent was to make the execution of glitches as simple as possible while still being challenging and fun.
Though the custom ASM & graphics prevent BNW2 from being a completely "vanilla" hack, the glitch tech involved *is* vanilla and can be reproduced in the base game.

name: Missing Banban
description: Grab your weapons and delve into this action side-scroller intense adventure. Jump around and explore the insane levels. Shoot and dodge your way through enemies. Fight to find your friend and solve the disappearance!

name: Frost Bite 2
description: Frost Bite 2 is the sequel to Frost Bite. The player controls a climber who is trying to reach the top of several different mountains, this time with caves!

name: Dangerous Derek's Livestream
description: Sin descripción

name: Pixel Pop
description: Chop melons, smash the military and make animal noises to the beat!

name: The Rescue 1-4
description: A Tomb Raider fangame made with TRLE.

name: The Rescue 5: Temple of Osiris
description: A Tomb Raider fangame made with TRLE.

name: Little Magic World
description: Little Magic World for Enchant Jam.

name: Upducted
description: Sin descripción

name: Final Outpost: Definitive Edition
description: Final Outpost is a survival strategy base-builder. You lead the last survivors of the apocalypse. Assign roles, craft tools, and manage resources carefully. Construct buildings, level up your citizens, and fortify your town against hordes of zombies. How many days can you survive?

name: GigaBash: Mighty DLC - R.O.J.A.K & Balzarr
description: Sin descripción

name: Z
description: You're trapped in the house alone during one of those zombie apocalypses everyone's talking about. Just you and your trusty gun, and the desire to survive. Shoot zombies and don't get caught by them.

name: Project Reignition
description: Project Reignition is an on-rails platformer developed by KumaPauZ, also known as Kuma. This unofficial remake of Sonic and the Secret Rings, originally developed by Sonic Team and published by SEGA in 2007 for the Wii, aims to reimagine the classic game for modern systems. Built using the Godot engine, this open-source and free project features enhanced graphics, refined controls, and a smoother frame rate, offering a fresh experience while staying true to the original.

name: Missile Command
description: Remake of Missile Command for Xbox 360.

name: Cybermatrix
description: CYBERMATRIX is a game about speed and movement. A difficult and exciting adventure awaits you, which you will have to pass using one multifunctional knife and many different abilities. But the further you go, the more different techniques you will discover, and the stronger your opponents will be.

name: Hockey Hockey Club
description:
Hockey Hockey Club is a feel good ice hockey game with the cutest and wobbliest animals of the whole polar circle. But don't be fooled by their adorable little faces, Hockey Hockey Club is a die-hard hockey game with all the usual hockey stuffs (5 on 5 games, faceoffs, one timers, bodychecks, one on ones , ...) and a twist of arcadey moves (super shots, flips, slowmo...).

Eight teams of determined hockey players are present in the game with a lot of statistics for all the numbers fans: stamina, speed, handling, shoot... Pick the best teammates to defeat the other teams!

Play against the computer (3 levels of difficulty), or play with your friends locally (for up to 4 players). You can even play the game online with the help of the fantastic Parsec technology!

name: Fortnite: Band Flair Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Spooktober Visual Novel Jam!
description: Help digital mascots Lime, Cherry, Plum and Lemon navigate their way through the Spooktober Visual Novel Jam competition. Laugh, learn, and scream(with excitement, we hope) through this visual novel and make choices to guide the girls to great success or dramatic failure!

name: Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous - Visitors from Morta
description: A window into another world has opened among the wastelands of the Worldwound

name: The Adventurers
description: The Adventurers is a turn-based tactical RPG where every decision shapes your legacy. Lead your party of heroes in an open world filled with random events that affect your story. Survive a high fantasy landscape where your epic saga is waiting to be written.

name: Digable Planet
description:
You're the only one that can save Mankind's fate. Find the artefact buried deep beneath the surface of the planet and be a true hero!

The Galactic Governor has spoken: you're Mankind's only hope! Find the artefact buried deep beneath the surface of this unstable planet to give Mankind a chance for a brighter future!

Hint: There are several artefacts buried on the planet but only one will save Mankind's future!

name: Deception Engine
description: Upcoming heist-themed roguelike deckbuilder by the developers of Chrono Ark. It is said that it will feature a similar combat system, full combat visuals and permanent dungeon progression.

name: Assasseed's Crin
description: Help Altzio kill as many targets as possible in this small Assassin's Creed demake made for the Mini Ludum Dare #50.

name: EyeOS
description: A short (and borderline nonsensical) mystery game where you are trying to find out what happened to your missing friend by rooting around in their computer. Play by clicking on things and searching terms in the EyeOS home screen!

name: A Logical Dive
description:
Welcome to "A Logical Dive", a game made for the Cyberpunk Gamejam 2014.

Help Tyrell and Pops dive into an architectural maze and hack security cameras and computers. Find the best routes, beat your times and get to the end of a thrilling story!

name: My Dancin' Computer
description:
We are sitting at the computer and everything seems to be going smoothly, but then Virusnya appears! A character who does not have access to administrator rights wants to infect our computer. We can stop this by using my protective dome to protect our files from Virusny's attacks, then charging up Sultan, the Anti-Virus, to defeat that prankster!

This and more will be available in the new game "My Dancin' Computer". This is a rhythm-based game based on "Game & Wario: Pirates" with interesting characters, catchy music, custom OS, and much more.

name: Revive of The Moon
description: Mitsuki, a high school girl, is caught up in an unprecedented disaster that comes out of nowhere. And the town is filled with deformed monsters. What is her destiny? A fusion of light action and zombie horror, A zombie action game supervised by Eiko Kano.

name: Super Monkey Ball Bounce
description:
Super Monkey Ball Bounce was a mobile title released on Android and iOS in 2018.

You won’t be able to put Super Monkey Ball Bounce down!
•Tons of levels set across lush, diverse worlds
•Awesome boss puzzles
•Cute playable monkey friends each with unique powers
•Intuitive aim/shoot gameplay
•Compete with your friends to top the Facebook leaderboards

name: What's done is Done
description: A narrative-driven puzzle game about souls and forgetting. On the brink of reincarnation, she loses all her memories, and her soul is scattered. The memories of lingering spirits on the bridge seem to be connected to her story...

name: Cardcaptor Sakura: Memory Key
description:
The official licensed anime adaptation of "Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card" invites you to embark on an adorable journey to collect little Sakura's treasures.

Chibi 3D Sakura is here with cuteness overload, experience the joy of collecting mystery boxes right on your mobile device!

name: Plastic Spouse Interrogation
description: A post-human bio-management simulation. In a strange future, you awaken in a plastic body. The authorities question you, but you don't even know what you are. You must quickly grasp this weird world and your place in it, or else face state-sanctioned oblivion.

name: GhoulScrapers
description:
Ghoulscrapers is a precision platformer where you play as Eggroll, the new employee at Ghoulscrapers.
You owe the government one gazillion dollars and it's your job to pay the debt before it's too late!

name: NPC Adventure: The Arena Update
description: The Arena Update is an update to NPC Adventure to add an infinite battle mode alongside many new additions

name: My Time at Evershine
description: Be the Governor of a brand-new settlement on the fringes of the Free Cities, facing the almighty Duvos Empire. Recruit settlers, build infrastructure, tame the wilds, and lead your people to become a new cornerstone for the Alliance in this adventure-packed simulation RPG!

name: A Helping Hand
description:
King Boo has returned to force Mario players to socialize. Players must work together through shadows, riddles, and schemes to thwart his evil plans.

This QLDC Hackjam entry is designed to be played with a partner. You'll play together simultaneously, on different systems, with a way to communicate. The hack doesn't connect to the Internet. No special emulator is required.

name: Happiness! Sakura Celebration!
description: Once every ten years, the cherry blossoms stay in bloom longer than usual, and the seasonal festivals are much more grandiose. This year is known as the Year of the Cherry Blossoms. With the arrival of the Year of the Cherry Blossoms once more, various people begin to feel various feelings sprout up again.

name: Nature Challenge
description: A Super Mario World rom hack made for SMW Central HackJam 1.

name: Super Diagonal Mario
description: A rom hack based on a joke (Mario diagonally) from a Brazilian YouTuber's community.

name: Run from the Feds!
description: Third person 3D platformer with the goal being get to the end as fast as possible.

name: Amazing Math Starring Marvel Super Heroes
description: Educational arcade-style games with Spider-Man, Wolverine, Iron Man and She-Hulk. Learn addiction, subtraction, multiplication, division, fractions, geometry and more. Exciting animation, sound and interactivity. Ages 8-12.

name: Creepy Pomni
description: Overcome obby challenges and puzzles, get through rooms of horror in a digital circus. Try not to get caught by Pomni, Jax, Caine and Gangle who have gone crazy.

name: Megaman X: Omega Blaster - Definitive Edition
description: Megaman X Omega Blaster is an Arcade/Arena style fangame inspired by the classic saga arcades (Megaman: The power Battle & Megaman 2: The power fighters) but focused on the X saga but more dynamic, fun, challenging and with improved graphics.

name: Mario Jam
description: This is a hack with 6 worlds. Each world has 4 levels, for a total of 24 exits.

name: 02Rhythm
description: 02Rhythm is a rhythm game developed for mobile phones. Inspired by popular rhythm games such as Hatsune Miku: Project Diva and the Persona: Dancing All Night series, it is played by tapping on the screen in the rhythm of the music.

name: Friday Night Funkin': Yellow
description:
FNF: Yellow is a love letter to the hit fangame: Undertale Yellow!

In this mod you will sing with many familiar faces from UTY, as well as some extra guests from various parts of the UT/DR fandom.

name: Age of Luigi
description:
Mario was frozen for centuries and woke up to a changed world.
What has become of the Mushroom World since his absence?

name: Adventure Kitty: Drill Buster - Lights Out
description: Get ready to dive back into the fast-paced world of Adventure Kitty: Drill Buster! This thrilling drilling game takes you on an exciting journey through unique biomes where danger lurks at every turn. In this chapter, Carton and Felicity have retrieved the Earth element, but their adventure is far from over. Now, they must brave the treacherous Lab Biome, a high-tech environment filled with perilous machines and cunning enemies determined to stop them from reaching their goal.

name: Project: ARK
description: Project: ARK was developed for the first GBJAM over a two week duration.

name: Hero Guider
description: Hero Guider is a construction puzzle game. In the game the player is required to build a various facilities to connect the roads in order to help the hero go through the maze.

name: Rainbow Islands: The Story of Bubble Bobble 2
description: A Java Legacy Mobile Port of "Rainbow Islands: The Story of Bubble Bobble 2"

name: Bub's Puzzle Blast!
description:
The legendary masterpiece, the combination of the Bubble Bobble & Puzzle Blast!
The legendary masterpiece, the perfect combination of the nostalgic Bubble Bobble and Puzzle Blast!
Defeat monsters with original characters from the original series.
Use your brain and try to reach the top of the Rainbow Tower with colorful bubbles moving in the air.
Destroy monsters and obstacles by popping bubbles of the same color and making Special Bubbles!
Rescue your enchanted friends and join forces to build your own Miniroon Town.

name: MogMog Planet
description:
It's a simple match 3 puzzle that anyone can pick up and play!
Clear puzzle stages to obtain Stars and use them to create your very own MOG MOG PLANET! The more planets you own, the more animal friends you will unlock.

name: Airbreak
description: Sin descripción

name: Harvest101
description: A cute indie strategy card game! Decorate your own farm with deck-building!

name: Seoul 2033: Shelter
description:
Manage the Shelter in Seoul, devastated since the nuclear explosion.

'SEOUL 2033 : Shelter' takes place in ruined city of Seoul after a nuclear explosion. As the Shelter 1 Administrator, you manage the shelter to survive.

name: Seoul 2033: Yusijin
description: A short prequel in Seoul 2033. On that day of a nuclear explosion, we have to find our daughter in a confused city.

name: Heoeonjeung Sogaeting! 2
description: A lie for love.

name: Super Bumble Trials
description:
Fresh outside and hardcore inside bike trials

Super Bumble Trials is a new bike racing game in the trials genre with a fresh art style and elaborate physics, bright locations and hardcore gameplay.

This is an alternative take on the trials genre from developer Psebay: Gravity Moto Trials, in which you have to overcome a path consisting of levels, each of which is filled with a wide variety of obstacles. For example, on one level you can find giant plants and mushrooms, on another - big logs and boulders, and on the third - a huge pumpkin in the clouds.

There is nothing superfluous here, just you and the hardcore gameplay of the game, one on one!

Forward! A challenging but exciting adventure awaits you!

name: The Legend Of Tartar
description:
Join Tartar on an Adorable Dream Adventure!

Dangerous monsters have appeared in Tartar's dreams!
Please help Tartar stay undisturbed in its sweet sleep!

Our adventure will become another legend!

name: Saechi's Adventure
description:
Those who teased me are all in their graves now!

Let’s go on a sparkling adventure with Saechi!
Raise and help Saechi and punish all the villains!
Go for it, Saechi!

name: Redbean Rhapsody
description:
His(her) adventure is called the Redbean Rhapsody.

Let's go on a thrilling adventure with cute Red Beanny!

name: Call Of War: Frontlines
description:
From the Frontlines, raise an army and overpower other players!

The world is on the brink of war. You can play in real-time. Show your skills with tank clashes, naval battles, air combat and nuclear weapons! In Call of War you influence the fate of many nations.

Play as the leader of one nation when a worldwide conflict seems inevitable. It all boils down to one question: What is your strategy? Find your allies, build up your economy and conquer enemy territory. Research new technologies and secret weapons. Be the first to develop the ultimate bomb and even rockets to become the one true superpower! It is up to you to end the war and bring balance to the world!

Call of War offers a one of a kind gameplay environment to simulate worldwide conflicts on many different multiplayer maps all over the world. Control and develop a huge real-time army roster and jump into synchronic multiplayer matches. Battle it out over several weeks until victory conditions are met and the true world dominating superpowers are revealed!

name: Total Supremacy
description:
Tap, Conquer, Repeat: Command Armies, Shape Economies, Rule the World!

World domination – it's closer than you think! Total Supremacy puts you in charge to conquer the world. Gear up for thrilling 3D battles, real-time decisions, and a whole lot of strategizing as you try to outwit the globe.

Go ahead, customize your ultimate fighting force! Tanks, infantry, heavy-duty vehicles... deploy them all for spectacular combat that brings your strategies to life. The battlefield is always changing, so adjust your tactics on the fly and leave your enemies in the dust.

Remember, making friends (and crushing them later) is the name of the game! Build alliances, coordinate plans, and then scheme together for a total global takeover. In the world of Total Supremacy, diplomacy is your secret weapon... wield it wisely!

name: Archers Online
description: Archers Online combines addictive gameplay, gorgeous graphics, and rewarding progression in one immersive shooter adventure. So, what are you waiting for? Dive into a world of endless multiplayer mayhem and bow-slinging fun, and show everyone who the true archer hero is!

name: Zenless Zone Zero: Update 1.1 - Undercover R&B
description: Zenless Zone Zero 1.1 released on August 14, 2024, adding more story content, new characters and a bunch of changes to the base game. Including new game-play content and balance changes.

name: Flappy Dragon
description: Dodge towers, collect dragons, and explore worlds in this epic flappy adventure!

name: Puzzsoft’s Cooleidoscope
description: Welcome To The Official Puzzsoft Kaleidosocope, a psychadelic bundle of 4 brand new games from everybody's favourite people (JohnLee Cooper, Marty Daniels, Michael Guattery, and Rachel Theil).

name: Just Another Platformer
description: It's a challenging 2D platformer from an indie studio, where you must climb a treacherous tower to save your mother's life from a deadly illness.

name: Pro Basketball Manager 2025
description: Pro Basketball Manager 2025 is the ultimate basketball manager experience. Suit up and become the manager of a basketball team. You’ll have all the managerial tools you’ve come to expect in a manager game, scouting, facilities, training and more. Will you put emphasis on coaching or player development? Success is only the result of your decisions both on and off the court.

name: Dead Eye Deputy
description: Be quick on the draw in this wild west shootout! Dead Eye Deputy is an old fashion wild west shoot out! Be quick on the draw, ride a horse, battle other outlaws and more.

name: Crystal Guardians
description: Crystal Guardians is a cute pixel art beat 'em up game! Recover more pieces of the crystal shards from the clutches of the final boss. As our heroes vanquish armies of monsters, they must defend the last crystal shard.

name: Elvin: The Water Sphere
description: A cute runner game with great retro-style pixel style and unique enemies! Run Elvin run! There's no time to waste. The future of Goomswood Forest and its inhabitants is in your hands! Elfrod the Goblin has sprung out from the depths of the Earth and has stolen the Water Sphere. Elvin must recover the Water Sphere before it runs out of power. Elfrod is a mischievous underground goblin. He is quick and devious, with the power to travel through dreams! Elfrod has tricked Elvin into fleeing through strange worlds, forbidden to the Forest Elves. That won’t stop Elvin, though. He'll follow Elfrod til the end, even ignoring his sacred Elven laws - in order to recover the droplets left by the Water Sphere. The race has begun... Run Elvin, run! Don’t forget to share your score and challenge all of your friends!

name: Al Gurbish in... Nick it & Run!!!
description: Sin descripción

name: 2-Bit Cowboy Rides Again
description: Sin descripción

name: Void Climber
description: Climb to the top of a collapsing universe in this parkour platformer with roguelike elements. Gather resources, spawn platforms, and obtain powerful upgrades to survive before the world crumbles beneath you. Just don’t fall into the void.

name: Epic Dragons
description: The dragons are under attack! Help them to defend their homeland by unleashing them on their foes. Use your abilities to launch explosive meteors and powerful lightning bolts upon those who would steal from the dragons!

name: Overwatch 2: PlayStation Plus Mega Bundle
description:
Don't miss out on the free Legendary Beekeeper Sigma, Legendary Art Deco Symmetra, seven Epic Skins, and five Battle Pass Tier Skips. This bundle is available for a limited time for all PlayStation Plus members.

This pack includes:
- Beekeeper Sigma Legendary Skin
- Art Deco Symmetra Legendary Skin
- Runner Sojourn Epic Skin
- Punker Queen Junker Queen Epic Skin
- Construction Ramattra Epic Skin
- Matsuri Kiriko Epic Skin
- Cassia Lifeweaver Epic Skin
- Amethyst Illari Epic Skin
- Rugby Mauga Epic Skin
- 5x Battle Pass Tier Skips

name: MultiVersus: MVP Pack 2
description:
The MultiVersus MVP Pack offers in-game content to further customize and boost your play for subscription members.

MVP Pack 2 includes a Legendary Leave me Alone Ringout and an Epic Respects Sticker Emote.

name: Harry Potter Quidditch Champions: Firebolt Supreme Broom Skin
description: Sin descripción

name: Zen Training
description: Zen Training is a beautiful and unique puzzle game. The title combines puzzle dynamics with those of a rhythm-game. It has been designed to be the definitive pastime. The game is set in a classic Japanese Zen garden and is based on the concepts of Order and Chaos. In the heart of the garden there is a maple tree around which are located 5 stones with 5 different colored symbols to which correspond “mana stones” falling from the tree. The player's task is to match symbols and colors in order to promote Order and Harmony, flowing trough an infinite series of standard and bonus levels.

name: Fight Legends
description: RPG combat arena with bloody medieval sword fights for honor and shadow bounty

name: Easy Ball Game
description: Easy Ball Game is a brand new game that unlike its name is an extremely difficult game based on the Only UP style of play! Climbing has you rolling, jumping and testing your balance. The game consists of several zones with different graphic styles and obstacles all to be discovered.

name: Art Attack
description: Art Attack is a 2D side scrolling shoot-em-up with gameplay inspired by Gradius, Silver Surfer, and Cuphead. The aesthetic of each level is based on a different artist or art movement from history.

name: Iter
description: Journey to the Surface - Explore, Develop, Fight, Die… Repeat! Welcome to the frontline! Workers are as expendable as they are useful. Your job is to mine resources, upgrade equipment, defend your base and restore power to the Undercity.

name: Infinos Exa
description: An ehanced version of Infinos Gaiden with several new features for the EXA Mode such as new ships, new enemy designs, some boss swap.

name: Coldsweat and Tears
description: This started off as a low effort vanilla project, where the author would make each level in a day. But the author liked the levels so much I decided to put more effort into it.

name: Plusris
description:
Play with just one finger.
One stroke brain training addition puzzle game to improve your brain.
A simple yet profound free brain training puzzle game using numbers.

name: Catacomb Towers
description: This is the author's very first level made with the level editor. It took him 2 months to build. Although some people found the level too dark he did not change the lighting values nor the ambient settings. The level recieved very good ratings and reached the number 5 position in the top 10 chart at that time on the famous review site of Michael Prager. It has now vanished into the hall of fame on December 2002 and has become a classic title in the tomb raider custom levelworld.

name: Astropods: Starside Glaze
description:
Astropods: Starside Glaze is a 2D Fighting Platformer with endless mobility and combat potential! Starring as Hemi and Acro, swap between them at any time to utilize their unique attacks and physics within various environments.

Astropods combines platform fighter combat with platformer styled levels, alongside nonlinear progression and perk customization, to create a dynamic combat-platforming experience unlike anything else!

name: Coldy Drinkeria
description: Puzzle game about preparing drinks to the sound of samba. Game made for Enchant Jam #1.

name: House of Dead Skin
description: Large, abstract and extremely beige single map set in an abstract beige facility built into abstract beige caves. The map is meant to be pretty nonlinear/explorable and large chunks of it are hidden in secrets and/or optional to the non-completionist. Texture theme/visuals and combat setups take a lot from Stardate 20X6 and The 10X10 Project (though it's not quite as hard as those wads.)

name: Sub Game
description:
This game is part of the #lowrezjam.
The aim is to destroy waves of enemy subs without being destroyed yourself.

name: Parasol Stars: Rainbow Islands II
description: A Port of "Parasol Stars: Rainbow Islands II" (also known as Bubble Bobble 3) was published by Ocean for the Game Boy in 1992.

name: Sunes Sportlov
description: Sune is love-stricken by his neighbours daughter Sophie, who is also vacationing at the same resort, but manages to antagonize her at the start of the story, so she makes up some difficult tasks for him to fulfill before accepting his invitations.

name: Princess Maker: Karen
description: A upcoming Princess Maker game developed by D-ZARD.

name: Balloon to the Moon 2
description: Balloon to the Moon 2 is a Semi-Open World Retro Style Platformer inspired by Jet Set Willy. After the First Game, Peter made it to the Moon but is then greeted by the moon's Inhabitants. Which are humans with rabbit ears. The Moon Rabbit Princess offers you to live with them if you can complete a trail to grab all the moon treasures scattered throughout the moon. You will have to navigate several areas to grab all the treasures.

name: The Bound of Time
description: The Bound of Time is a tiny action adventure and was made for #lowrezjam within 3 weeks. There a some bugs yet, but the game it's playable and i hope it's enjoyable to.

name: Black Cat Blitz
description: Welcome to Black Cat Blitz! A game of magic, wonder, and gambling your life away. Play as Nemo (or Mimi if you're a gamer girl rawr) as you try to make the best hand possible by collecting cards, climbing stairs, grabbing chips, and avoiding obstacles. Try playing with a friend in co-op mode! or dont... and be lonely

name: Blobl.io
description: Blobl.io: A strategic 2D multiplayer RTS game where you build and defend your base, capture resources, and outmaneuver opponents in tactical gameplay.

name: Sniper Assassin 3
description: Help elite sniper Shawn Davidson get the revenge he so desperately wants in this third installment of the Sniper Assassin series. Much like the previous games, in Sniper Assassin 3, you’re embarking on a series of missions, all of which with a specific target (or targets) that you must discover and take care of. The trick is discovering how to complete each mission. Make the wrong move, and it’s over.

name: Sniper Assassin 4
description: The fourth chapter in the bloody game series for Sniper Assassin. Follow along with each mission in Shawn’s quest for revenge. Open a mission and read the description of your target. Pay attention to the details of your target so you don’t make a mistake!

name: Blobun
description: You are a blob bunny. Your goal? Touch every tile!

name: Sniper Assassin 5: Final Mission
description: In this final chapter of the Sniper Assassin saga, you’re chasing down the man responsible for everything in a series of puzzle-based sniper scenarios. Will he pay for what he’s done, or will he only be making a fool out of poor old Shawn?

name: Zombie Zombie
description: You are on a mission to kill zombies.

name: Creative Kill Chamber 2
description: Help Monty break his friend Kenji out of the Kill Chamber by using various ways to dispatch and kill your enemies!

name: Cheezure
description:
Game made for NoneJam 7 in which the player controls the ship of the great pirate captain Lespito and helps him face the dangers that await him on the seas.

Manage your cheese intelligently and improve your entire ship to reach the golden treasure, the great Cheezure.

Could you be the most fearless mouse on the seas?

name: Pump It Up Zero
description: Pump It Up Zero is the 12th (domestic) and 7th (international) release of Pump It Up series. This game is the third and final game in the Exceed series developed by Team Freevolt.

name: Snow Fight
description: A multiplayer snowball fight game using snowmen.

name: Last Star
description: Last Star is a space shooter roguelite with tower defense elements. Pilot a spaceship to protect your solar core from endless waves of alien invaders. Upgrade both your core and spaceship to become unstoppable. Execute tactical counterattacks against alien motherships to slow down the invasion.

name: Freeland
description: Freeland is a virtual universe waiting to be explored, conquered, and shaped by your choices in this massively multiplayer online role-playing adventure. Immerse yourself in a colossal VR galactic online adventure where expansive open worlds teem with endless possibilities. Engage in quests that will challenge and reward you as you traverse this ever-evolving virtual universe. Unveil the rich storyline and forge your identity while connecting with players from across the globe through unparalleled social experiences.

name: Acid Factory
description: There has been a huge chemical leak at the factory and its up to our hero Harry to clean it up. Unfortunately for him there is a whole bunch of traps, mutants and well... ACID to deal with in the process!

name: Ark: Aberration Ascended
description: On Aberration, survivors face exotic and extreme challenges within a vast underground biome system upon a derelict, malfunctioning ARK. Survivors will uncover the ultimate secrets of the ARKs, and discover what the future holds in store for those strong and clever enough to survive!

name: Bristle and the Artificial Invasion
description: Bristle and the Artificial Invasion is a platformer game made in GB Studio that tells the story of a paintbrush named Bristle, whose planet is invaded by an army of artificially generated monsters. It's up to Bristle to rescue his friends and save any neighboring planets affected by this catastrophe.

name: BuKnight: The Order of the Golden Crest
description: BuKnight is a fun and speedy action-platformer mixing the late '90s era mascot fever with the mid-2000s indie game craze. Use your up-and-downsmash attacks, as well as the special swirling move to hurl pain at your enemies or to change your momentum and dodge their attacks as you zoom past or towards them.

name: Guess Their Answer
description:
Some people have an amazing ability to read minds. They seem to know what others are thinking of even before they say it. If you are that kind of a person, this game is just for you!

Here you need to guess what the other players answered to a certain questions. It can be anything, so just say the first thing that comes to your mind. Then compare your reply with the answers of the rest.

Play this fun and simple game online and see how many answers you can guess!

name: Russian Train Trip 3: Gorbachev's Posters In The Apartment
description: Posters of Soviet President Mikhail Gorbachev will appear in your apartment.

name: Russian Train Trip 3: Personal Computer In The Apartment
description: An old personal computer appears on a table in the character's apartment

name: Russian Train Trip 3: Instant Arrival In Novosibirsk
description: This add-on allows you to instantly get to the main goal in the game - the train station in Novosibirsk.

name: Russian Train Trip 3: Flashlight
description: The add-on adds a regular flashlight with which you can find something interesting in the game

name: Russian Train Trip 3: Beer On The Train
description: The add-on adds beer bottles, 3 pieces, to the passenger train car.

name: Russian Train Trip 3: People In A Train Car
description: This add-on adds a girl and a guy to the passenger car of the train.

name: Russian Train Trip 3: Posters In The Train Car
description: This add-on adds a girl and a guy to the passenger car of the train.

name: Ryuu ga Gotoku 0 Kihon Muryou App
description:
An application released for PS Vita with some minigames and a reconstruction of Yakuza 0's arena.
Some Arcade games were released as DLCs, such as Super Monkey Ball: Banana Splitz.

name: Radical Problems
description: A Half-Life 1 Modification where you play as a Scientist in Area 9 Hazardous Waste Facilities.

name: Russian Train Trip 2: Fast Time
description: Adds time acceleration to the game Russian Train Trip 2, to see all the content, all the train stations and not to spend 10 hours playing the game.

name: Russian Train Trip 2: VIP Seat In The Train Car
description:
This DLC makes a real VIP seat out of your compartment car, which includes:

Various items on the table (pizza, soda, mug, etc.)
Posters
Headphones
Other items.

name: Russian Train Trip 2: A Beautiful Girl In Your Place
description:
This DLC adds a girl companion to your compartment car.

The girl lies on top of your seat and is pleasing to the eye.

name: Russian Train Trip 2: Putin's Posters in the Train Car
description:
This DLC adds Vladimir Putin posters to your compartment car.

The posters hang on two walls and always delight your eye, no matter where you sit.

name: Red October
description: A first-person adventure game with a story. You will go to the Soviet city of Pokrovsk. You can walk around the city, talk to residents, solve mysteries and much more.

name: Brawl+
description:
Brawl Plus is one of the first mods released for Super Smash Bros. Brawl, primarily intended for competitive play, but includes many quality of life features, such as the removal of random tripping and separated character icons for Sheik, Zelda, and the Pokémon Trainer.

It was abandoned following Version 7.0.3 in 2010, with most moving on to the mod's spiritual successor, Project M.

name: Me de Unou wo Kitaeru: DS Sokudoku Jutsu
description: Me de Unou o Kitaeru: DS Sokudoku Jutsu is a game, developed and published by MileStone Inc. for the Nintendo DS, which was released in Japan in 2006.

name: Fábulas Porteñas
description: In this game, you'll take control of a character who was riding the subway when it unexpectedly stops at an unfamiliar station named "Pirámides". As you look around, you realize you're alone in this strange place. To find your way back home, you'll need to discover codes, solve puzzles, and explore your surroundings.

name: Bowser's Revenge 4
description:
Bowser's Revenge 4 has 8 Worlds and an additional Star World, and several unique bosses made specifically for this game. There is quite a fair bit of custom ASM,
especially in the Star World, which should make this an interesting experience.
The difficulty varies as it's fairly easy in the first few worlds, but
difficulty increases a bit past World 6, especially in World 8 and the
Star World. Unfortunately, I can't choose both Standard: Hard and Standard: Normal, but just know it gets more difficult as the game progresses.
As for the bosses, none should be too difficult or too confusing... maybe.

name: Spelunky64
description:
Spelunky is a cave exploration / treasure-hunting game inspired by classic platform games and roguelikes, where the goal is to grab as much treasure from the cave as possible. Every time you play the cave's layout will be different. Use your wits, your reflexes, and the items available to you to survive and go ever deeper! Perhaps at the end you may find what you're looking for...

Paul Koller brings you the official Commodore 64 port of Spelunky. You can now play the classic roguelike how it would be intended on the best-selling 8bit computer!

name: Sir Fallen: Shadows of the Phoenixheart
description:
Step back into the armor of Sir Fallen in the first DLC Expansion. Years ago, a cataclysmic war shattered your home and disbanded the knighthood, leaving the powerful artifact known as the Phoenixheart stolen and lost to the ages.

Now, after many years, you have returned to a world where shadows of the past linger. Retrieve the Phoenixheart and restore it to its rightful place, rekindling the legacy of your order.

The fate of the kingdom lies in your hands.

name: Assassin's Creed Unity: Underground Armory Pack
description:
'Always be better prepared than your enemies with these new additions to your armory.
Arm and protect your assassin with:
- 2 complete outfits and 2 pieces of gear for additional customization options.
- 3 pistols and 2 swords to show off your combat skills.

name: Karpe Diem
description:
It's that time of year again... Karpe Diem!

The famous festival of the Joisey region which brings travelers from far and wide to compete in a fishing competition overseen by the widely adored Mayor Slowpoke. Set out on adventure to become the next Karpe Diem champion, face off against a worthy rival, meet helpful strangers, and solve thematic puzzles.

This fan-made Pokemon slice of life game strips out longtime series mechanics such as battling, badges, and evolutions to instead focus on things like kicking back, relaxing, and reeling in a whopper.

name: Alter Ego S
description: Enhanced version of Alter Ego.

name: Swap Motion
description: Sin descripción

name: Remain on Earth
description: Sin descripción

name: Project: One Bullet
description: Sin descripción

name: Cain & Iddo: Break Week
description:
The year is 2013. Cain the dog and Iddo the hyena are two plucky 24-year-olds navigating life alone in the East Coast American metropolis of Westside City. Their zany misadventures don't turn out exactly as planned, wacky unforeseen circumstances arise, and hijinx ensues...

Cain works as a barista at the local mall's Starbuzz franchisee. Due to requirements from higher Starbuzz management, his boss Sergio has to give Cain a week off work for the summer. Cain and Iddo have decided to get some bucket list activities done over this week-long break... but you can probably guess that finishing that list is not going to be as simple as it seems.

name: Galacard
description: Play with cards, with your Game Boy... with aliens!

name: Potatostrike
description: A space shmup featuring the ultimate potato-based space fighter.

name: Canvas Intruder
description: Canvas Intruder is a game about an artist named Pix who got sucked into the canvas world unfortunately thanks to her apprentice's black magic. goofy. But now its up to Pix to navigate through these canvas levels!

name: Celestial Soul
description:
Celestial Soul is a 2D game about anthropomorphic fox who's found himself in the middle of somewhere??

He's on a quest in the Void to retrieve the lost shards of his SOUL, which was shattered by his clumsy new friend.

name: Alex's Caves
description: Alex’s Caves is a Forge mod for Minecraft 1.20.1 that adds 5 new cave biomes to the Overworld. Unlike most normal biomes, these cave biomes are exceedingly rare - yet they all contain a variety of unique blocks, items, mobs and mechanics that makes them considerable subterranean destinations. These five biomes are the Magnetic Caves, the Primordial Caves, the Toxic Caves, the Abyssal Chasm and the Forlorn Hollows.

name: Live Mystery: The Worst Behind the Scenes in History
description: Sin descripción

name: CodStar
description: Sin descripción

name: Cubenen Gardens: Befriend
description: Cubenen Gardens: Befriend is a story-driven indie RPG where you play as Michael, a nerdy kangaroo inventor from the Tech District. They have a lifelong goal of making monsters less of a threat to society. And their research takes them to the abandoned offices of the Mall District to test a theory regarding how monsters relate to the memories of the deceased. Things go well, but then they get caught up in a corporate nightmare. Slowly breaking them down and leaving them desperately searching for a way to escape.

name: Danger Cliff 2
description: Danger Cliff 2 is a very open-ended 2D Platformer inspired by Super Mario 63. Run, jump, and drill through huge, interconnected levels with wild themes, unique mechanics, and branching paths. Between being able to hunt down whatever collectibles you want, taking advantage of deep movement mechanics, and three playable characters to choose from, you decide how you tackle this adventure!

name: Scifi Zombie
description: A deadly virus, designed to reanimate the dead and integrate them with cybernetic enhancements, escapes containment and turns the facility's inhabitants into relentless, cybernetic zombies.

name: Rods: Rod Roll
description: Keep rolling! Gift drops every hour!

name: Distancy
description: Distancy is a tightly made with passion, tough as nails, Game Boy Color-inspired 2D platformer with various other inspirations! Originally, the game started out small but blossomed into a full team for its creation. Feel the world come to life before your very eyes!

name: Eggs: All Guns Broken
description: Warning: This game starts 6 minutes long but can go on forever. Eggs is a slow-paced casual rail shooter that places you in a desert loop to face endless variations of baddies. Fly as far as you can!

name: Kurragömma med Mumintrollen
description: The first release in a series of nearly a dozen Nordic PC games based on the Moomin stories. A simple point-and-click experience based on finding missing Rock Dass in Moomin Valley.

name: Dream Enkoure
description: A not so simple platformer where you go from left to right.

name: GeographyHelp
description:
GeographyHelp is an educational quiz-based game focused on enhancing geography knowledge through interactive learning. The game offers a mix of single-player challenges and Twitch-integrated multiplayer modes designed to test users' ability to recognize countries and geographic features. The theme centers on world geography with a specific emphasis on helping users improve their skills in games like GeoGuessr.

Players engage in a variety of quiz categories that range from flags and country traits to unique geographic identifiers like road signs or language usage. The game features a resource database containing maps and visual aids to assist in learning and memorization. In the multiplayer modes, users can compete in real-time with friends or Twitch viewers making it an interactive experience for streamers and their audiences.

Quizzes are structured with a time limit adding an element of challenge as users are tasked with answering multiple-choice questions based on images or maps. With categories including bollards, license plates, and special letters the game provides a wide array of geography-focused topics. The inclusion of Twitch chat participation allows viewers to collectively take part in quizzes enhancing engagement for both the streamer and the audience

name: DreamShock
description: Blast through nightmares, come dreams or reality!

name: Last Message
description: Can something be so terrifying that it would drive anyone crazy just to hear about it? It all starts when someone sends you a message from your friend's cell phone, asking for help to escape from a situation as complicated as it is obscure. From the various options, choose the ones that seem most appropriate and follow the course of the story, guiding a complete stranger through underground tunnels. Pass by creatures capable of inspiring madness in the eyes of the beholder. Your choice of options can change not only the course of the game's story, but also who you are in it. Find your way out or get lost in the process.

name: Dungeon Gals
description: A small polycule-turned-crisis control team been summoned to help a civilization in the sky escape impending doom! Explore dungeons, solve puzzles, and find lots of treasure to help prepare yourself for incredible challenges!

name: Bleeding Roots
description: Bleeding Roots is a short horror walking simulator taking place throughout the seasons. Water the plants in your garden, learn about them, and grow along them over time. Immerse yourself in a story about loss, grief and obsession. The controls are simple, moving the character through tank controls and reading up on the environment with an interact key.

name: Lovely Lady RPG
description: Lovely Lady RPG is a game about wandering around and just sort of seeing what happens. After waking up with a hole in her ceiling, a cosmic space Orb embedded in her chest and no recollection of basically anything, Ghost sets out to continue her life as best she can.

name: Swords of Freeport
description:
Swords of Freeport is a text-mode social RPG heavily inspired by the style of Bulletin Board System door games from back in the '90s. It is part MUD and part BBS Game (without the need for a BBS). You can play it on your home machine alone, or play/install it on an internet-accessible machine where others can join you.

It is heavily inspired by games such as Legend of the Red Dragon, with a certain numbers of turns per day. Select a profession, join a guild, and make a name for yourself.

name: Firedog: Swooce & Rescue
description: Firedog: Swooce & Rescue is a momentum-based platformer where you play as a firefighting dog with a powerful firehose. Balance the uncontrollable force of a handheld firehose with the athletic moves of a high-energy Pomeranian as you fight enemies, put out fires, and rescue the good citizens of Dog City. And yes, you can pet the dogs.

name: Foxblade Fable
description: A young boy is forced to embark on a quest to master the powers of the Divines,

name: Dice, Destiny and Death
description: Fairy tales were truth, Koschei has awakened, and along with him, all the unclean creatures. Hut on chicken legs, nymphs, water spirits, and other beings may seem cute, but only until they have fed on your flesh. We don’t need a hero, we need someone who will survive!

name: Rocket League: Season 16
description:
Urban Legends Emerge from the Arena’s Darkest Depths.From the menacing Mothman to the chilling Chupacabra, ancient folklore revs to life in Rocket League Season 16!

Legendary monsters have been sighted on the field, but are they real or just an illusion? Turn up those headlamps and shine a light on the myths (and moths) of Rocket League Season 16 starting September 4!
⁠
⁠In Season 16, wade into the worrisome wilderness and compete in an all-new Arena, Drift Woods. And if things get too eerie, take comfort behind the wheel of Rocket League’s latest cars.

name: Última Mensagem 2
description: A horror game inspired by the tales of H.P. Lovecraft told through a group of instant messages. Before the story of Last Message, Tiago decides to do some urban exploration in an abandoned mansion he may never return from. Talk to him and Ana in the “Galerinha do Mal” group to try to help your friend get out of the nightmare he unknowingly entered.

name: Frebbventure Alliance
description: That's right, the cat came back, and this time, with more. More what? More friends, more enemies, more action, more levels, more bosses, more story. More everything! Frebbventure Alliance takes the formula for a game that prided itself on being jam-packed no-frills action platforming madness, and does it even harder!

name: Last Message Plus
description:
Can something be so terrifying that it would drive anyone crazy just to hear about it? It all starts when someone sends you a message from your friend's cell phone, asking for help to escape from a situation as complicated as it is obscure. From the various options, choose the ones that seem most appropriate and follow the course of the story, guiding a complete stranger through underground tunnels. Pass by creatures capable of inspiring madness in the eyes of the beholder. Your choice of options can change not only the course of the game's story, but also who you are in it. Find your way out or get lost in the process.

Compared to the original Last Message, 14 achievements and 10 different endings have been added to this game. Much of the game's artwork has been redesigned! Photos have been improved and entire dialogs have been rewritten! Now with audio (the use of headphones is highly recommended) and costs less than a snack at the snack bar!

name: TNT: Threevilution
description: "TNT: Threevilution" is a full thirty-two map boom compatible megawad inspired by the works of TNT, specifically in their contribution to Final Doom, created by General Roasterock and @DoomTheRobot (featuring @NaN and American McGee). It has zero meaningful story, as God intended, and has been able to create cancerous growths in a lab environment.

name: Free Skies
description: Free Skies is a mix of arcade skating and speedy platforming inspired by Jet Set Radio, Tony Hawk, and Sonic.

name: Rooftop Rascal: The Drizzle Cat
description:
In "Rooftop Rascal: The Drizzle Cat," you control a clever cat navigating city buildings' fire escape stairs to the rooftop.

The gameplay centers on jumps, and quick thinking.
Your goal is to climb as high as you can and reach the rooftop.

developers.name: Christian Marcell de Oliveira trading as chroda

name: biketerra
description: Biketerra is a web-based indoor cycling app that lets you create and ride any real-world routes.

name: Frostbite Friends
description: Frostbite Friends is an 80's arcade-style top-down shooter inspired by both niche and classic retro games, starring two snowkids, Mike and Milly, as they venture to rescue the mysterious Dream Stars from the hands of the devious King Guzbum and his assembly of goons!

name: Fuu3: Minus3’s Lab
description: Fuu3: Minus3’s Lab is a point-and-click game being created on the Clickteam Fusion 2.5 engine. Discover what you thought you knew about the titular Minus3, Fuu3’s sworn rival! Meet some extravagant characters, take systems down, and piece together who you were meant to be in this 2000s Newgrounds-inspired take on origin stories!

name: The Object
description: A man who lost his head and his memories found himself trapped inside a mansion. He must search for clues as he tries to escape, with or without the solution to both of these mysteries.

name: Garbage Girl Louise
description: Garbage Girl Louise is an indie platformer about breaking down boxes, cleaning up streets, and taking names! Of course, this is done through bouncing on evil moles, magic trash cans, and cardboard boxes, all while tossing anything you can get your grubby trash girl hands on! Save trapped raccoons, meet weirdos around the city, and even race against your ex-girlfriend! Dingy streets! Bubble wrap! Magical eggs! Lesbians! Yeah, we have everything!

name: GingerSnap
description: Collect and combine ingredients for a wide combination of moves. Inspired by old N64 era favorites, like Kirby 64 and MegaMan!

name: Goldio
description: Goldio is about 6 random people who got sent to a different dimension by the villain, Gamebear. The friends have to escape and stop Gamebear from luring more people into his universe, they do this by going through all the different stages of the game to explode Bresh Mountain!!

name: Hexachampions
description: Hexachampions is a TCG-tabletop RPG hybrid: every Champion has its unique die and abilities. Your strategy is key, but it will be up to the roll of the dice to dictate what your tools will be. So you always know what to blame in case you lose.

name: Real Cake Maker
description: Grab your mixer and let the cake-making fun begin!

name: Alian Planet
description: Sci-fi horror action ADV fighting aliens on an unknown planet!

name: BallZ DX
description: Ultimate block breaker with all the bells and whistles

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: The Willow Man
description: Beware The Willow Man as he lurks throughout the halls, in your dreams, and into your soul. Can you survive the night in this horror adventure.

name: Mahjongus: Mystery of Fortescue
description: Uncover the mystery of Fortescue solving classic mahjong puzzles

name: Helix Fruit Jump
description: Helix Fruit Jump is a casual arcade game where you control a ball that bounces through a platform made of fruit and cake slices.

name: Hentai Girls: Lovely Lieutenant
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Eggconsole Dragon Slayer: The Legend of Heroes PC-8801mkIISR
description: Falcom's Dragon Slayer VI is the series' first command-type RPG! As Prince Selios of the Farlane Kingdom, defeat the evil Akdam!

name: City Driver: Police Parking Simulator
description: A fun and realistic parking simulator that will test your driving skills in a police cars and other transport!

name: Cooking Arena Breakfast Bonanza
description: Sin descripción

name: Cooking Arena Pancake Paradise
description:
Your adventure begins with Food Truck Tycoon. Cook, chop, bake and enjoy hundreds of unique dishes. But the journey of a thousand dishes is just the beginning!

As you hone your cooking skills and build your reputation with food trucks, you'll be given the opportunity to explore more gourmet games as DLC. Customize your kitchen with countless upgrades and serve delicious food in different locations. Keep the grill hot, keep your customers smiling, sauté, mix and serve to the top.

In this vibrant and cartoon-styled adventure, you have complete control to upgrade and customize every element of your supermarket. Enemies and bosses will shoot projectiles, but beware because they will shoot a TON OF BULLETS.

name: JettFuel
description: In JettFuel, you play as Jett: a robot used by a factory until its sudden closure. You managed to escape the factory before it was destroyed, but the whereabouts of your brother and fellow coworker Brody, are unknown. In order to reunite with Brody, Jett must collect the Power Gems, which are scattered across many different areas, with some being held by bosses. The gems give the user the power to make one wish. There are also 3 hidden Caged Whisps, creatures made of pure light. in the game to try to find!

name: Resident Evil Crossfire
description: Resident Evil: Crossfire was a Resident Evil fan game designed by Thor Steinbach in 2001. Set in Raccoon City during the Raccoon City Incident, it stars gothic high school student Lucrecia Callahan as the primary protagonist, who is caught at the subway station when the outbreak reaches her. At that point she frantically tries to reach her friends' house to save them. The second playable character is college student on leave, Felicity White.

CEO City is the Edutainment game which intend to support and provide players learning of current CEO Governor"s obligation comparing with the previous general governors that how different they are. Besides, it is the game which can increase and develop management skill as players were CEO themselves and have to manage their good province for their citizen satisfaction. This will judge whether they could be voted to be the CEO again for next election or not.

Not only supporting learning of CEO, but also a tool to encourage the OTOP by setting OTOP as a part of management stipulation which CEO have to distribute for their province highest utility.

Rather than only rapidly progressing through mostly linear stages to reach a goal miles away from where you start, Sonic makes whatever world he finds himself in his playground.

Two players face off using unique cards, each with distinct abilities and roles. The game’s key mechanic, the Swap, allows players to switch cards during your tunr, triggering powerful effects and shifting the momentum in exciting ways. With an ever-growing roster of sports-inspired cards, frequent updates, and strategic depth, Mixcity Swap offers endless replayability for players of all skill levels.

name: Mega Man 15: The Robot Apocalypse
description:
This game was made to celebrate Mega Man's franchise and delve deep into its rich history and legacy. This is a turn-based RPG with a lot of difficulty options so even if you don't like turn-based, you can just breeze through its rich new story!

Here you control four heroes who are fated to fight against a evil scientist named Doctor Wily and his evil robots that are destroying the city and breaking Space-Time itself!

Fight iconic enemies, bosses, find many easter eggs, collect mysterious items and uncover new events that connects different timelines.

description:
Pirates of the Caribbean Multiplayer is a massively multiplayer mobile game based on the series of films and the Disney theme park attraction of the same name.

The game starts you off as an inexperienced captain of a pirate ship with no reputation, no gold and minimal knowledge of the seas around you. But don't despair, Mate! Build up your infamy score by creating alliances with other players, fighting fierce battles and embarking on all manner of adventure and exploration. You'll soon be one of the most feared pirates of the Caribbean!

name: Pokémon Aragonite
description:
Pokémon Aragonite is a fanmade project based on the real life island of Sicily, in the South of Italy.
Started by FrankieChatot and Darkonius Mavakar;
This project aim to reimagine Sicily into the Pokémon world by creating the Sylia region, where you will be able to explore many areas and cities based off actual places!
Initially this started as a fakemon dex where we had fun interpreting our culture, flora and fauna into Fakemon, but then we decided to use Pokémon Essentials to turn it into a playable game!

The story is based on the old fairytale story The Snow Queen.

This will be a story driven game. So there will be no battling. Just moving around, interacting with people and objects while solving simple puzzles.

The game will contain voice acting but only for the main cast. Sonic, Shadow and The Snow Queen.
