name: Sonic Dungeons: Prototype
description: This a concept for a first-person action game set in the Archie Sonic universe. A game where the player explores the open world of Mobius, recruits various freedom fighters to their team, and raids enemy fortresses ran by Dr. Eggman.

name: Sonic Eclipse
description: Sonic Eclipse is a 2D Classic Sonic Fan Game, created by the BrainBox Interactive Team, featured as an entry to this years (2024) Sonic Amateur Games Expo!

name: Sonic Emerald Madness
description: Sonic Emerald Madness is a boost styled Sonic game that takes its inspiration from Sonic Rush, Sonic Colors and a bit of Mario 64.

name: Ping Pong Clásico en 2DD
description: Welcome to Classic 2D Ping Pong! This simple and addictive game will let you relive the nostalgia of arcade games with a simplified version of the classic Pong. Whether you want to compete against a friend or hone your skills, this game is perfect for a good time.

name: Knight George
description: Knight George is an Action-RPG game in which you play as the titular character in the Kingdom of Earlyne, wielding your trusty sword and many objects to ultimately save the day.

name: Sonic Endless Adventure
description:
Welcome to Sonic Endless Adventure! This is a fan game in which there level created in real time.
In the game you will visit the Green hill level, again. You have only 3 lives, losing them, will end the level. During the passage you will encounter Red Star Rings. With it you can open music for the level.

name: Sonic Fighting Heroes: King of The Ring
description: Sonic Fighting Heroes: King of The Rings (SFH: KOTR) is a MUGEN-based 2D Fighting Game, which has been in development since 2017.

name: Sonic Freedom Frontiers
description: Sonic Freedom Frontiers is a game that intends to feature many levels, three playstyles, and a longer story. It plans on combining light influence from RPGs with and Platformer inspiration, making it a larger scale game. It has cutscenes that tell of a narrative with a science fiction flavor, that I wrote. It also has two different styles of platforming, one with more emphasis on physics and momentum, the other on combat. If it is completed, it is likely to have five different zones, all with five levels in each of them, with most of them being platformer styled levels. It is meant to feature hub worlds with top down gameplay, NPCs you can talk to, and saving.

name: Sonic Gamebook Origins
description:
A brand-new old adventure!
Relive the classic adventure gamebook Sonic vs. Zonik, now in full digital glory!
Everything is recorded by the game! No more pencil and paper - enjoy the adventure without lifting a finger!
Progress saves automatically, so come back and resume your game as you please!
Never get lost again with the included Cheat Sheet, a detailed guide to every section in the game!
Toggle a variety of options to customize your experience and foil Robotnik's diabolical traps!
Features authentic Sega Genesis music to suit the mood of each location!

name: Little Sound Boxing Champion
description:
Coil, a young lightweight boxer challenges the status quo!
In a world where robots have taken over the boxing scene, Coil must box to the beat in order to take the title of Champion back for humanity in this fun little Rhythm Heaven inspired boxing game!

name: Zombie Cafe
description: Zombie Cafe is a freemium mobile simulation video game created by American Capcom subsidiary Beeline Interactive, Inc. In the game, players run a café by cooking dishes and serving customers with the help of zombies. Players can turn customers into zombies, who become employees. Players gain experience by cooking and serving dishes. There are a variety of menu items, each differing in price, number of servings, and time to cook. As the restaurant builds up savings, the player can purchase recipes and furnishings, and can infect more customers. The player can also purchase pets and expand their restaurant. Along with growing the business, players can send their zombies to raid enemy cafés to obtain new recipes.

name: Lusa the Cathead
description: Lusa the Cathead is an action platformer game where you get to play as a cute cat-head-looking creature named Lusa! Jump your way through the stages, collect orbs and break capsules while avoiding obstacles... and from now on, gathering polymers and megamers to gain score! This game is very customizable, with possibility for not only custom stages, but custom characters with unique mechanics, powered by Lua scripting, free for any modifications!

name: Avali: Final Battle
description: Avali: Final Battle is a first person shooter game developed by CL3NRc2 primarily featuring the colloquially known "cute fluffy space raptors"; the "Avali". Originally a creation in SPORE, they rose in popularity because of a mod for the game "Starbound" and even further thanks to models created for VRChat.

name: Lylia's Deadline: Clearance
description: A sequel to the original Lylia's Deadline which features high-speed 2.5D gameplay, low-poly 3D graphics, Rocking music, and more heat-based combat mechanics.

name: Lyrestruck
description: This game follows Irina, who's been wandering through an endless forest, in search of an exit. Will she discover the roots of this curse and break out?

name: Maimai DX Prism
description: The sixth release of SEGA's arcade rhythm game, maimai DX.

name: Man Human Person Thingy's Quest To Get Back The Gun
description:
Criminal stickman gets sent to prison without his trusty weapon, oh what will he do now?!?!??

Man Human Person Thingy's Quest To Get Back The Gun is a silly beat-em-up game that doesn't take itself seriously at all, inspired by flash games of the past!!

name: Levana Horror Tale
description: You must complete a lunar mission only with the other person on the radio. When you realize that you were not sufficiently informed about the place.

name: Men of Conviction
description: Men of Conviction is an original action platformer following the story of Izik Dang, a soldier of the underground rebel group Men of Conviction. Slash your way through four unique stages with a variety of different enemies. Use Chips to harness the power of the elements to assist you in your fight. Can you find the strength to stand against the trials that await you?

name: Purple Game
description: Purple Game is a JRPG about a castle that has turned pink overnight.

name: Moomi & Spike
description: Experience high-speed thrills and an engaging story in Moomi & Spike, a 3D platformer where agile gameplay and a captivating narrative collide in a vibrant adventure!

name: King Arthur's Quest
description: As King Arthur you must try to get rid of Morgana who as a put an evil spell over the land.

name: Mr. Triangle The Pizza Delivery Guy Mania Simulator 2k17
description: This is a really stupid joke platformer game I put way too much effort into. It's a sequel to the first games I ever made, Mr. Triangle 1-5 (6 was never finished) and is partially based off a dream I had.

name: Darkflow
description: Darkflow is a sci-fi adventure RPG that chronicles an epic, universe-spanning saga. Fight your way up from the slums to battle rival alien factions, take down cybernetically enhanced enemies, and discover the hidden powers pulling the strings.

name: Mr. Triangle The Pizza Delivery Guy Mania Simulator 2k17 Turbo HD Remix GOTY 2024 Edition: Coked Up + 1.5 Collection DX Directors Cut & Knuckles
description:
The first game in the Mr. Triangle Mania series (a sequel to some games I made as a child, of which the 6th entry was never finished), ported to the second's engine.
Including the extra story Mr. Triangle Mania 1.5, originally an SRB2 mod, now with its original intended ending.

name: Nina & Yuri
description: You play Nina, a girl who will need to cross several theater scenes to save her soulmate Yuri.

name: Bulletombe
description:
In ancient Greece, in the land of Helenia, a young woman who lived in the mountains closest to Olympus was in charge of looking after a mysterious vase inside the temple. One day the vase was making strange sounds and when Pandora went to check on it, the vase burst open and released all the evils that lay within, and along with them, a cherub named Lucy appeared to inform Pandora that this event would cause untold disasters on earth and that it was necessary to recapture them.
Pandora, with great courage and the power of hope that still resides in the vase, decides to travel through Helenia in search of the evils; luckily they are not too far away and the disasters they bring behind them are clearly visible.

name: Painter Blazer
description: Painter Blazer is a mix between action, arcade, and light puzzle games. You are playing as Blazer, a bunny who likes to paint. He finds a new job as a painter but the company is no good trying to replace workers with robots. Your job is to paint and blow up the robots and to find who is behind all of this.

name: Penn Guiny's Dream Sack
description: After being sucked into a sack full of dreams Penn Guiny lands into an area of the dream realm called "Sunny Shores". With the help of an unnamed cloud lady Penn Guiny learns how to traverse the dream realm.

name: Rule & Expand
description: A 2x strategy game (exploit and expand). Rule regions to gain money and men. Build armies and expand your empire. Manage your regions carefully or they will rebel against you. Take care of your armies' morale or you will lose control of them.

name: Tour de France 2024: Cycling Kit Pack
description: Experience all the action of the Tour de France 2024 with the official game

name: Land of the Vikings: Dage Island
description: Dage Island is a new map for "Land of the Vikings". The map is a new island with a mountainous terrain, providing players with new ways to build their Viking settlements.

name: BattleCore Arena: Kaps Pack
description: Unlock the entire appearance of Kaps for your core and banner, along with 2,200 Battlecoins to use in BattleCore Arena on boosts and cosmetics. This offer can only be purchased once.

name: Angel Legion: Chain Trace - Black
description: Embark on your adventure with player from all over the world! Lead your Angel team to reveal the ancient mysteries of Galaxy…… Welcome to Angel legion, a free RPG gacha game with good fun!

name: Woohoo!: Game "Escape & Evade"
description: Escape & Evade is a game where you need to reach the exit without being detected. You'll need to be stealthy and stay out of sight from the security cameras while maneuvering around obstacles. Make sure you disable the lasers before you walk through a door protected by lasers.

name: Classified: France '44 - Talon
description:
Hit the enemy where it hurts with new missions and a brand new map in the Talon Pack, with new equipment for the US Airbourne.

The Talon Pack contains:
New Map – “Manor”
Two new Special Ops missions:
• Foul Manors
• Hostage Negotiation
New Weapon:
• Mosin-Nagant M1891
New Weapon Variant:
• Trench Gun “Bear”
New Clothing Set
• US Airbourne “Talon” Set

name: DCS World: F/A-18C Operation Mountain Breeze by Sandman Simulations
description: In the fall of 2015, the battles of the Syrian Civil War between the rebels and the Syrian government forces continue intensely. The involvement of several foreign powers, ISIS, and Hezbollah in the conflicts further escalates tensions.

name: BattleCore Arena: Premium Founders Pack
description: Get access to the content of the Founders Pack along with an emote, a title, and one additional season pass token. This offer will only be available during the early access phase of BattleCore Arena.

name: Pomeraider
description: Pomeraider's an arcade game heavily inspired by the classic Mario Bros!

name: Hero Siege: Bifröst Viking Skin
description: Bifröst skin for Viking class

name: Hero Siege: Bifröst Jötunn Skin
description: Bifröst skin for Jötunn class

name: Ultreia: Enhanced Edition
description: Experience the mystical world of Ultreïa with the Enhanced Graphics update.

name: Bring Me that Shawarma: Supporter Pack
description:
Bring Me that Shawarma – Supporter Pack includes:

Bonus episode “Shawarma Snuff” (WILL BE AVAILABLE JULY 2024)
High-resolution arts
Artwork and photos without post-processing
History of the project creation with comments from the developers
Infinite love from the authors
New episodes will be able to come out faster!

name: Salvo Subs
description: Destroy your friends online in Salvo Subs, a retro inspired top-down shooter. Unlock 32 submarine vessels in 10+ arena game modes.

name: Pocket Pusher: The Citadel
description: "The Citadel" a level made to improve the core mechanics of Pocket Pusher, includes new collectibles.

name: Futanari Sex Adventures: Episode 1
description: An adult visual novel series with a beautiful red-haired futanari as a protagonist.

name: Project: Gorgon - Extra Character Slots Pack
description: Need "alts" for crafting, storage, or exploring other gameplay modes? This will add three more character-slots to your Project: Gorgon account.

name: Crash Dive 2: East Indies Expansion Pack
description: Includes one campaign, two new mission areas, three new ships, one new plane, and more!

name: BattleCore Arena: Founder's Pack
description: Get access to an exclusive Core appearance, banner background and symbol, a title, and one season pass token with the Founders Pack. This offer will only be available during the early access phase of BattleCore Arena.

name: Cuckold Sex: Episode 3
description: An erotic VISUAL NOVEL featuring HD graphics, steamy ANIMATIONS, and realistic-looking characters. Lily got herself a new yoga instructor to train her and help relieve her back pain, but James has other things in mind.

name: TaleSpire: Guest Edition
description: TaleSpire - Guest Edition lets you join, build, and play any TaleSpire campaign where the party has seats available. Has an ally of yours bought you a seat at the table? This is how you join them.

name: Hearts of Iron IV: Content Creator Pack - Soviet Union 2D Art
description: Paradox Interactive has teamed up with talented modders from the Hearts of Iron IV community to release a content pack with new art assets for the Soviet Union.

name: Forza Motorsport: Porsche 963 Combo
description: Celebrate The Big Race in Forza Motorsport with the 2024 Porsche #5 Porsche Penske Motorsport 963 and Porsche Racing Suit.

name: EVE Online: Equinox Era pack
description: Make the most of the new Equinox expansion with a great deal on 14 days Omega, 50 PLEX, one Standard “Boost” Cerebral Accelerator, one Core Ship Operations Expert System, and some limited design elements for the new SKINR for ships.

name: Nova's Adventure
description: After crashlanding on an unknown planet, Nova the Star sets out on an adventure to collect all the parts from his broken ship that was hit by an asteroid while on his way home.

name: Chromb
description:
Chromb is a clicker game about... chromb (chromb-chan).

In chromb game you click chromb-chan's ahoge to gain more ahoge which you can spend on things in shop or gain a prestige levels after reaching a certain amount of them.

name: Patchworld
description: As in other Action RPGs, you have to save the world. But this time there is no need to look for a legendary spell or an artifact created by a great sorcerer of antiquity. You create the spells yourself, and it's up to you to decide what they will be.

name: Salacot Jack: Deluxe
description: Fun puzzle and action arcade game.

name: Among Us VR: Glove Pack - Catch Deez Hands
description: The Catch Deez Hands Pack includes 3 pairs of gloves for your wardrobe: Foam Run — This one's for the biggest fans only. Smooth Operator — For a formal night out or a secret agent expected to die... Git Gud Gloves — Cheat codes not enabled when wearing these retro-style gloves.

name: Among Us VR: Limited Time Pack - DUM Duo
description: Deliver masked justice with this dynamic duo — the Vigilante Hat and Vigilante Gloves! With great power comes great responsibility… to look fearsomely fashionable.Vigilante Role not guaranteed. Does not include comically epic low voice or cape.

name: Plant Therapy: Plush and Pots Pack
description: This packs adds 75 new plushes and pots and display shelving to the game! Decor galore!

name: Glowie Shooter
description: They glow in the dark and they are coming to get you. You'll need to endure the relentless waves of upcoming glowies. Can you survive the night and get them before they get you?

name: Final Tank
description: This is a top-down barrage shooting Roguelike game. You will experience driving a tank in a dangerous post apocalyptic wasteland to dodge enemy bullets and use weapons such as cannons and machine guns to defeat enemies and save the world

name: Stay Home It Rains Outside
description: Your digital refuge at the Alpha Centauri settlement. Visit whenever things aren't going well. This is a productivity tool with game elements. Customize your second body, gather fluffy creatures, and tackle real-life tasks using built-in productivity features.

name: Almost Reversi
description: This is a board game that combines deck building and Reversi. Buy powerful stones from the store and try to win 12 times within your time limit of 12 minutes!

name: Elevatrix
description: "A first-person indie horror shooter where players solve puzzles on each floor of a haunted building, all while surviving attacks from the undead and racing against the clock."

name: The Cool Guys Are Level 100
description: The goal of this game is in it's name. Hack and slash through randomized stages with 8 different playable characters each with their own unique playstyles. Will you be able to reach level 100 without dying and (possibly) become a cool guy?

name: VR Ninja Dojo
description: VR NINJA DOJO offers an exciting training program that uses your entire body. Heated melee combat wielding swords, precise long-range attacks with shurikens, evasion training to dodge enemy attacks, and training to master ninjutsu await you.

name: Rabbit in Dungeon
description: A Little Rabbit Battles Ruthless Skeletons! Escape the Grasps of Numerous Skeletons, Flee the Dungeon, and Reveal Hidden Secrets.

name: The No No Man
description: A terrifying Indie horror experience with puzzle-platforming that will keep you on your toes as you find your way through the decrepit house. The only guidance you'll have going forward is your own wit and possibly the world's worst flashlight. But make no mistake, this is HIS house.

name: Chuzzo
description: Drop pucks. Score points. It's Chuzzo time.

name: Restock
description: This game is a dazzling puzzle adventure that invites players into a world of colorful, sparkling diamonds. The objective is simple yet addictive: swap adjacent gems to create sets of three or more of the same color, which then vanish, earning points.

name: Rampage Rowing
description: This game is a thrilling racing adventure that pits four characters against each other in a fast-paced competition.

name: Pollution
description: This game is a pixelated adventure set in a vast, open world where players pilot a plane using the ASDW keys for movement and the left mouse button to attack.

name: Super Mario Bros. +
description: Sin descripción

name: Surreal Farm
description: A vibrant and colorful world where creativity and strategy combine. you'll start with a humble plot of land, where you'll plant, harvest, and sell crops, raise quirky farm animals, and expand your farm into the largest and most prosperous in the region.

name: Janosik 2: Prologue
description:
Pick up the mantle of the plucky maiden getting ready for her date night that is unceremoniously interrupted by the dastardly duo of Countess Bathory and Baron de Blonde in this prologue to the colourful Janosik 2 retro action-platformer…

Janosik 2: Prologue is an introduction to "Janosik 2", presenting a separate story that takes place right before the events of the main game.

name: Food Delivery Simulator
description: Live the life of a food delivery driver. Deliver orders, earn money, upgrade your vehicle, explore a vast city, and make way to your success. Dive into a realistic daily adventure and level up to become the best delivery driver.

name: Haunted House Renovator: Prologue
description: Take the next step in the career of a ghost-fighting renovator in a standalone prologue! Explore the uniquely spooky apartment of a mad painter and discover its many hauntings. Use your tools to overcome the supernatural odds – and bring the location to its former glory!

name: Penelope Pendrick and the Art of Deceit
description: Pick up your magnifying glass as writer-turned-detective Penelope Pendrick in this first-person point and click mystery adventure! Three people have suddenly vanished from the sleepy town of Carlisle. Follow the clues, interrogate suspects, and solve puzzles to end this case - before it ends you.

name: Zafe's Adventures
description: Zafe's Adventures is a new and simplified 2D platformer game with a simple run and gun elements and gameplay. Inspired by abandonware platformer, Sonic the Hedgehog series and its fangame, Spark the Electric Jester, Jazz Jackrabbit and Freedom Planet and as well with other simple 2D game that was made using GameMaker or Scratch in the past. This has been considered as a small solo indie game project only. The game follows a young and heroic pyrokinetic cartoon humanoid who tries to fight back against evil entities around the hillside wilderness. While he ends up on a long journey through another different world via the mysterious dimension portal.

name: Sonic StrikerZ
description:
Welcome to Sonic StrikerZ!
Using 2D Fighter Maker 2022, experience 1v1s, 2v2s, 3v3s and even 4v4 2D chaotic fights across as of right now in this version 27 Zones with 11 characters, including a story/campaign mode with bosses and online!

How you use your power is up to you...
Do not forget your dreams...

name: Ascend to Zero
description: Have you ever wondered what it's like to stop the time? Ascend to ZERO is a time-control roguelike, in which you can use your special ability to stop the time itself and efficiently fight your way through the top. Freeze the time to dodge opponents' attacks using your unique ability, and always hold a higher ground for the combat. However, don't forget that the time allowed for you is confined.

name: The Sims 4: Life and Death
description: Peel back the veil to uncover the secret to fuller Sim lives and beyond in The Sims 4 Life & Death Expansion Pack.

name: Uncover
description: Uncover is an online fast-paced clue alternative card game

name: Shattered Souls
description: Hell hath no fury like a woman scorned, and you will not forget the betrayals inflicted upon you. With a mark that ties your fate to seven men, you’re determined to lay waste those who tried to shatter you. Will you try again?
3D Minesweeper 3D Logic. Randomly Generated. Unique Mechanics. Built-in Hints. Detection Assistance.

name: 100 Wars
description: The game mode is unpredictable like a kaleidoscope,and every opening is a brand new adventure. Sudden events are like surprise soldiers or mysterious Easter eggs, every shot is full of variables, and every decision is crucial. Multiple roles, multiple skills, multiple weapons, and multiple teammates

name: 15th Prison
description: There is no way out of this prison. But examine your surroundings carefully, do not ignore any abnormalities. Take the envelope given to you by the block officer and proceed, there may be an escape route. Your carelessness may result in death.
You are locked in a quiet apartment room. The only way out of the tightly closed door is to get to the truth of the case. Overcome your fear and try to escape.
In the year 2184, in the dystopian city of Neo-London, Hope, a young girl from the prole class, fights for her freedom under the oppressive watch of the One Party.

name: 4 Rush Together
description: "4 Rush Together" is a light-hearted and funny obstacle course game where you and your friends are tied together with a rope, adventuring through creative levels filled with fun. You can invite up to three friends to play together in local multiplayer or online co-op mode. What are you waiting for?

name: 7 Ate 9
description: Why was 6 afraid of 7? And why did 7 resort to cannibalism? Its your job as detective number 9 to find out what happened in this case of murder by numbers. 7 Ate 9 is a small horror adventure with a lot of secrets to uncover and multiple endings to find.

name: 7 Nights Keeper
description: In 7 NIGHTS KEEPER, take a job to watch over a mansion for 7 nights and uncover a horrifying secret: the elderly occupant is possessed by a demon. Survive the escalating terror and keep the darkness at bay, or become its next victim.

name: 8 Ball Goal
description: Kick the white ball as best you can and score the goal before time runs out.

name: 90s My Dear
description: This is a farm simulation management game, where players will play as a little boy who travels back to the 90s. Characters from classic movies and TV shows from the 90s will interact with you, helping them unlock various clearance items and restore our familiar world.

name: Abandoned City
description: Welcome to the abandoned city. All that's left in this city are zombies, and maybe they're interested in you. At the moment you are isolated, sure to die, but you have to hold on for as long as you can. Do you happen to know if someone will see your desperate uprising and rescue you..

name: Abducted
description: Play as the socially rejected host of ETRadio, desperate to discover alien life while being mocked for answering hoax sighting calls - until one turns out to be terrifyingly real. When the call comes in, will it be the air that goes dead - or will it be you?

name: Abnormal 1999: The Compass and the Sand
description: The fate of exile, like an endless river, carries Ann to a distant and unfamiliar land. A flame of unwavering determination burns within Ann's heart. She knows that one day, either Sam or SU will surely find her. Until then, Ann must find a way to escape this place.

name: Abnormality
description: Abnormality is an authentic & realistic multiplayer ghost-hunting horror game. Explore fully abandoned locations, investigate, and find evidence of the paranormal, but beware—the former residents may not appreciate your intrusion. Use night vision goggles to navigate through the pitch darkness.

name: AboFlah-intelliFinish
description: Puzzle game on a difficult level. Start disassembling and assembling puzzles to reach the finish line

name: Abyssal Wrath
description: Abyssal Wrath is a frenetic, merciless top-down shooter, set on a eldritch science fiction universe.

name: A Developer Nightmare
description: You’re stuck in a dream and must run a special program on your computer to escape. Anomalies in the house disturb you, increasing your stress. Work with 2 or more Players to clear them before your stress consumes you.

name: Adventure Paws
description: Adventure Paws is a pixel-style 2D side-scrolling adventure game where you and your friend will play as two cats, embarking on an exciting journey across a mysterious and unknown continent. Join the black and white cats and set off on this journey full of challenges and surprises!

name: Adventure of the Bucket
description: Embark on an adventure with the Iron Bucket and Wooden Bucket! Adventure of the Bucket is a cooperative multiplayer game where you control buckets connected by a spring to solve stages. Don't worry, you can play solo too!

name: Adventure in the Dungeon
description: Immerse yourself in the world of 2D action platformer, where you have to fight enemies and overcome obstacles.

name: Adventure Allies
description: This is a casual action-adventure game where you adventure with monsters on an unknown island and enjoy combat, exploration, and training. Work together with your fellow monsters to escape from the island before the terrifying night arrives.

name: Adrift
description: Drift away in the serenity of the desert. Untwine a labyrinth abyss and find oasis’s to unwind. Unveil a forgotten land sand swallowed. But remember, once you finally get lost, ADRIFT, just you, a truck and nothingness, it marks the arrival to the beginning, from here, you start to find your way.

name: Adrenaline Injection
description: Adrenaline Injection is the Demo version of Adrenaline Rampage game - Survivor platformer. You are trapped in a distorted space city. You need to survive and return home. Standing in your way are hordes of techno-mutants. And something strange is going on in this space city.

name: Aetheria: Whispers of the Forest Moon
description: In the enchanting world of Aetheria, three fairy warriors are on the cusp of graduating from their academy when their city is suddenly attacked. Embark on epic quests and missions to uncover the source of the darkness threatening their land.

name: Aetherian Chronicles
description: Aetherian Chronicles is a 3D Casual SideScroller MMORPG focused on interaction with AI controlled players. Explore, train, party up, make friends and trade with real people or AI controlled players! Customize your character to your hearts content and choose your own way to experience your adventure!

name: Aetherdale
description: Fight your way through the magical kingdom of Aetherdale in this roguelite, collecting powerful weapons and artifacts along the way.

name: Aether Collector
description: A surreal point-and-click adventure about harvesting mysterious Aether in an abandoned town. As a new corporate hire, explore a reality-bending anomaly, uncover dark secrets, and confront existential horrors while questioning the true nature of your mission.

name: After Tasks
description: Overtime horror game to be played at school late at night. Wait for the video playback to complete or go solve the paranormal, the choice is yours.
